Activity: Arrive at work, log into the EHR system, and check emails. Review any communication from @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2 regarding upcoming EHR integration enhancements or modifications.
Review the standardized protocols and tools for influenza symptom assessment within the EHR. Pay attention to any reminders or prompts related to patient education materials available within the EHR.
Address the first patient for influenza symptoms, using the standardized protocols and EHR-integrated tools. Meticulously document all observations and patient responses directly into the EHR.
Enter patient data into the EHR for patients seen this morning, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
